caption.p: Future change in carbon stocks and NECB with mitigation strategies relative to BAU management. The decadal average change in forest carbon stocks ( A) and NECB relative to BAU ( B) are shown. Italicized numbers over bars indicate mean forest carbon stocks in 2091–2100 ( A) and cumulative change in NECB for 2015–2100 ( B). Error bars are ±10%.
